en.BOT_PINGED:
Hi! My prefix is `{}` but you can change it by using the `prefix` command.
Use `{}help` to see all my commands
en.NEW_BOT_PREFIX:
Hi, my prefix is `{}`, but you can change it by using the `{}prefix <new-prefix>` command.
Use `{}help` to see all my commands
en.NEW_BOT_PREFIX_ERROR: The new prefix may not be longer than 2 characters!
en.CHANNEL_BLACKLIST:
Use `{}blacklist add/remove #channel-1 #channel-2` to add or remove some channels from the blacklist (you can provid how many channels you want).

Use `{}blacklist view` to see which channels are blacklisted on your server.
en.CHANNEL_BLACKLIST_ADD_ERROR:
Please provid all channels you want to blacklist. Usage :
```{}blacklist add #channel-1 #channel-2 #channel...```(You can provid how many channels you want)

Use `{}blacklist view` to see what are the blacklisted channels in the server.
en.CHANNEL_BLACKLIST_REMOVE_ERROR:
Please provid all channels you want to remove from the blacklist. Usage :
```{}blacklist remove #channel-1 #channel-2 #channel...```(You can provid how many channels you want)

Use `{}blacklist view` to see what are the blacklisted channels in the server.
en.COGS_LIST: Here is the list of all cogs:
en.PLUGINS_LIST: Here is the list of all plugins:
en.USE_PLUGIN: Use `{}plugin <plugin-name>` to see a plugin description!
en.PLUGIN_ENABLE_NONE: Please provid the plugin you want to enable. You can see a list of all plugins by using the command `{}plugin <plugin-name>`!
en.PLUGIN_DISABLE_NONE: Please provid the plugin you want to disable. You can see a list of all plugins by using the command `{}plugin <plugin-name>`!
en.PLUGIN_CANNOT_BE_LOADED: Plugin "{}" cannot be loaded... Maybe he doesn't exist.
en.PLUGIN_CANNOT_BE_UNLOADED: Plugin "{}" cannot be unloaded... Maybe he doesn't exist.
en.MISSING_PERMISSIONS_ERROR: You don't have the permissions to do this.
en.BOT_JOIN_GUILD_DESCRIPTION:
Hi! You just add me in `{}`.

You can visit the online documentation [here](https://docs.nebulabot.info/) or use the `?help` command.

The default prefix is `?` but you can change it using `?prefix <new-prefix>`.
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_CHANNEL_NO_VALID_PARAM:
Please provid all require parameters :
```{}welcome-channel <action> <channel>```
(Notice that <channel> depends of your action)
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_CHANNEL_ADD_NO_VALID_C:
Please provid a valid channel :
```{}welcome-channel add <channel>```
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_CHANNEL_REMOVE_VALIDAT: You don't have a welcome channel anymore.
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_MESSAGE_NO_VALID_PARAM:
Please provid all require parameters :
```{}welcome-message <action> <message>```
(Notice that <message> depends of your action)
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_MESSAGE_REMOVE_VALIDAT: You don't have a welcome message anymore.
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_MESSAGE_NO_SET:
Automatic welcome message isn't set in this guild.
 Use `{}help` to know how to set it.
en.COG_ADMIN_WELCOME_SIMULATE_NO_WELCOME_ME: You don't have any automatic welcome message set.
en.COG_ADMIN_LEAVE_MESSAGE_NO_VALID_PARAMET:
Please provid all require parameters :
```{}leave-message <action> <message>```
(Notice that <message> depends of your action)
en.COG_ADMIN_LEAVE_MESSAGE_REMOVE_VALIDATED: You don't have a leave message anymore.
en.COG_ADMIN_LEAVE_MESSAGE_NO_SET:
Automatic leave message isn't set in this guild.
 Use `{}help` to know how to set it.
en.COG_ADMIN_LEAVE_MESSAGE_SIMULATE_NO_LEAV: You don't have any automatic welcome message set.
en.COG_ADMIN_AUTOROLE_NO_AUTOROLE: You don't have any autorole set in this guild.
en.COG_ADMIN_AUTOROLE_LIST_DESCRIPTION: All the new members will get this role when joining.
en.COG_ADMIN_AUTOROLE_REMOVE_VALIDATED: You don't have an autorole anymore.
